name: Island Jumper
description:
Island Jumper is a platform and casual game where you have to reach distant island walking on a wooden board. If the board is too short or too long you will fall in the water! Also, some island may hide traps that will throw you away if you step on them, or you may encounter some strong winds that will make you fall down!

In this islands live some strange creatures called Pixies. Catch them and unlock new characters!

There are also Play Games achievements and leaderboards, so you can challenge your friends!

So, download in Play Store!
